Posts.Content: thetwinkle1234 wrote: hi there, a new member to the forum. it's commendable to know that so many of you here(diagnosed/non-diagnosed) are staying positive regardless of come what may.. i had an ultrasound done 6 months ago and they found multiple benign breast cyst(which included 1 complex cyst and majority of the others are septated cysts.. the report also stated simple and debris-filled cysts). also, they are ranging from 0.5cm to 1.41cm in size... they also found benign fibroadenomas, 2, to be exact. the doc didn't perform any biopsy test and the result stated benign changes seen in both breasts and that no suspicious areas/nodules are seen yet i cant seem to stop worrying about it since i know that biopsy is the only way they can confirm the nature of all lumps? was recommended to wait and see and then do a re-scan in 6 months.. shouldnt they have done a biopsy on the complex/debris-filled/septated cysts as well as on the fibroadenomas? lastly, i have a few questions in mind that i hope someone can address; 1) what are septated breast cysts? are they something that i should be concerned about? 2) is it possible/common to have ALL of the different lumps(fibroadenoma, complex breast cysts, septated breast cysts and simple breast cysts?) 3) how accurate are the radiologist in reading the films and with the diagnosis just from ultrasound? Thank you for your time and may God bless all of you :) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: feeling sick with all these worries thetwinkle1234 Wren44

Posts.Content: thetwinkle1234 wrote: Hey ladies! I was just wondering if anyone knows what does it mean when an ultrasound reports states that you have prominent lactiferous duct visualized? and mine is only on the left breast..as far as i know, lactiferous ducts are like canals which transports milk? i am 21 this year, am not pregnant but had just ended my menses a day before the scan...could it possibly be due to that? Would appreciate help on this matter, thank you ladies Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Please help me to understand my report thetwinkle1234 Cindyl
